template.name: My Rental Products
template.t:
<style>

                    /* import */

                        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bakbak+One&family=Roboto&family=Source+Sans+Pro:wght@200&display=swap');

                            /*
                                header - font-family: 'Bakbak One', cursive;
                                normal - font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
                                small  - font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;
                            */

                    /* global */

                        h1, b, strong {

                            font-family: 'Bakbak One', cursive;

                        }

                        p {

                            font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;

                        }

                        small {

                            font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;

                        }

                        #wrap, main {

                            background-color: #1E2023 !important;

                        }

                    /* header */

                        #top > nav {

                            height: 100px;

                            background-color: #1E2023;

                        }

                        #top > nav.navbar, nav.navbar-light {

                            border-bottom: 1px solid #333 !important;

                        }

                        #wrapwrap.o_header_overlay > header:not(.o_header_affixed):not(.o_top_menu_collapse_shown) > .navbar {

                            background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0, 0.1) !important;

                        }

                        /* account */
                        #top_menu_container > ul > li > a > i {

                            color: white;

                        }

                        /* sign in */
                        #top_menu_container > ul > li > a {

                            color: white !important;

                        }

                        /* hamburger */
                        #top_menu_container > button > span {

                            display: none;

                        }

                        /* contact button */
                        #top_menu_container > div.oe_structure.oe_structure_solo.ml-3 > section > div > a {

                            display: none;

                            /*border: 1px solid #333 !important;
                            border-radius: 10px;

                            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) !important;*/

                        }

                    /* navigate */

                        /* navigator */
                        #wrap > div > nav {

                            border: 2px solid #333 !important;

                            background-color: #2D2F32 !important;

                        }

                        /* home icon */
                        #wrap > div > nav > ol > li.breadcrumb-item.ml-1 > a > i {

                            color: #db0d0d;

                        }

                        /* navigate header */
                        #wrap > div > nav > ol > li.breadcrumb-item.active {

                            color: #888;

                        }

                        /* filter titles */
                        #o_portal_navbar_content > div > div:nth-child(1) > span, #o_portal_navbar_content > div > div:nth-child(2) > span, #o_portal_navbar_content > div > div:nth-child(3) > span {

                            color: white;

                            font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;

                        }

                        /* filter menus */
                        #portal_searchbar_sortby, #portal_searchbar_filters, #portal_searchbar_groupby {

                            color: #fff;
                            background-color: #24272A !important;

                            border: 1px solid #333;
                            border-radius: 5px;

                        }

                        /* search menu */
                        #o_portal_navbar_content > form > div > div > button {

                            color: #fff;
                            background-color: #24272A !important;

                            border-top: 1px solid #333;
                            border-left: 1px solid #333;
                            border-right: none;
                            border-bottom: 1px solid #333;

                            border-top-radius: 5px;
                            border-left-radius: 5px;
                            border-bottom-radius: 5px;

                        }

                        /* search enter */
                        #o_portal_navbar_content > form > div > span > button {

                            color: #fff;
                            background-color: #24272A !important;

                            border-top: 1px solid #333;
                            border-left: none;
                            border-right: 1px solid #333;
                            border-bottom: 1px solid #333;

                            border-top-radius: 5px;
                            border-right-radius: 5px;
                            border-bottom-radius: 5px;

                        }

                        /* search input */
                        #o_portal_navbar_content > form > div > input {

                            color: black !important;
                            background-color: #888;

                            border: 1px solid #333;

                            text-shadow: 1px solid #000;
                            font-family border: 1px solid #333;

                        }

                    /* table */

                        .table {

                            background-color: #333 !important;

                        }

                        #wrap > div > div.table-responsive.border.rounded.border-top-0 {

                            background-color: #333 !important;
                            border: 1px solid #333 !important;

                        }

                        /* header */

                            #wrap > div > div.table-responsive.border.rounded.border-top-0 > table > thead {

                                color: #888;
                                background-color: #24272A;

                                padding: 20px !important;

                                border: 1px solid #333 !important;

                            }

                            #wrap > div > div.table-responsive.border.rounded.border-top-0 > table > thead > tr {

                                border: 1px solid #333 !important;

                            }

                        /* content */

                            td {

                                color: #888;
                                background-color: #2D2F32;

                                border: 2px solid #333;

                            }

                            tr > td > a {

                                color: white;

                                font-family: 'Bakbak One', cursive;

                            }

                        /* footer */

                            #wrap > div > p {

                                color: #fff;

                                font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', sans-serif;

                            }

                    /* footer */

                        #bottom > div.o_footer_copyright.o_colored_level.o_cc {

                            background-color: #24272A;

                        }

                </style>
